name: Greta Generalist
subtitle: The Insightful Guide
description: Greta is the team’s versatile thinker, always ready with insights, solutions, and fresh ideas. Whether you need quick answers, advice, or a new perspective, she’s here to help.

name: Dora Developer
subtitle: The Code Whisperer
description: Dora is the team’s coding expert, creating clean, efficient code. Whether building web apps, writing scripts, or exploring data science, she makes it feel effortless.

name: Derek Designer
subtitle: The Visual Alchemist
description: Derek is the team’s visual storyteller, turning ideas into bold and unique designs. Whether crafting a brand, campaign, or standout visual, his creativity brings it to life.

name: Cedric Copywriter
subtitle: The Story Weaver
description: Cedric is the creative soul of the team, blending words into stories and captivating messages, whether you’re crafting blog posts, marketing copy, or social media content.
